tasks.task: Farming operations at Hampton Farms in September
subtasks: Understanding the process of field drying peanuts
Recognizing the importance of the crop and harvest timing
Assisting with crop handling after digging
Supervising the drying process for optimal harvest conditions
Identifying the type of peanuts grown at Hampton Farms
Monitoring the growth season and yield
Preparing the peanuts for the combine harvest
Ensuring proper drying and storage conditions
